title: Diamond Blossom Stud Earrings - Merugu Tapeswaram
features: Floral cluster design with prong setting maximizing diamond brilliance. Features a modern interpretation of a traditional 'Butta' earring style.
occasions: perfect for a modern bride or a simple Seemantham ceremony.
description: Crafted with exceptional diamond quality and superior gold purity, these earrings provide a timeless elegance and sparkle. The floral design symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings, making them a meaningful gift. The design is both modern and versatile for a woman of today.
